2.2.2.1. Nodal Load¶

NodalLoad(no, load_case_no, nodes_no, load_direction, magnitude, comment*, params*)¶

  • Parameters

    • no (int): Line Tag
    • load_case_no (int): Load Case No
    • nodes_no (str): Tags of Nodes
    • load_direction (enum): Load Direction Enumeration
    • magnitude (float): Load Magnitude
    • comment (str, optional): Comments
    • params (dict, optional): Parameters

2.2.2.2. Nodal Load Force¶

NodalLoad.Force(no, load_case_no, nodes_no, load_direction, magnitude, force_eccentricity, specific_direction, shifted_display, comment*, params*)¶

  • Parameters

    • no (int): Line Tag
    • load_case_no (int): Load Case No
    • nodes_no (str): Tags of Nodes
    • comment ( str, optional): Comments
    • load_direction (enum): Load Direction Enumeration
    • magnitude (float): Load Magnitude
    • force_eccentricity (bool): Force Eccentricity Option
    • specific_direction (bool): Specific Direction Option
    • shifted_display (bool): Shifted Display Option
    • comment (str, optional): Comments
    • params (dict, optional): Parameters
